text: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتَۢاۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَقُونَ

translation.en: And never think of those who have been killed in the cause of Allah as dead. Rather, they are alive with their Lord, receiving provision
translation.id: Dan jangan sekali-kali kamu mengira bahwa orang-orang yang gugur di jalan Allah itu mati; sebenarnya mereka itu hidup, di sisi Tuhannya mendapat rezeki
